message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It offers unparalleled value and quality, making it an exceptional investment. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $13,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive price. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product.  However, I'm only able to pay $10,000 at this time.  This is my final offer.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My revised offer for the product is $11,000. I believe this strikes a fair balance between the value we both see in the product. Please let me know if this offer is acceptable.
